author: parithosh
content:
Congrats to everyone on the merge!

This is the official deprecation notice for `mainnet-shadow-fork-13`, the last merge testing shadow fork. In case there is something client teams want to test on there, please do reach out in the next few hours. 

We'll additionally be merging all the forks/PRs of the merge testing tools (`consensus-deployment-ansible`,`ethereum-genesis-generator`, etc) in case anyone has been using the forks in their CI.

author: potuz
content: Thanks for all your work to you and your team Pari, user support it's very time consuming and little appreciation is gained. Dev support must be even harder with our random requests
